definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
to inspect/to review/to read/to peruse/to go through/to experience

sentences.chinese: 上校集合士兵列隊接受檢閱。

sentences.english: The Colonel's Review is a dress rehearsal for the Trooping the Colour ceremony
sentences.chinese: 上校檢閱儀式是授旗儀式的一次彩排。

sentences.english: The presidents then reviewed U. S. troops assembled for the occasion.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，兩位總統檢閱了美國的儀隊。

sentences.english: No combat -ready unit ever passed inspection.
sentences.chinese: 沒有打過勝仗的部隊總是被檢閱。

sentences.english: He held a presidential review of the troops from a flag-draped grandstand built in front of the White House.
sentences.chinese: 他在白宮前面的看臺上檢閱了部隊。

sentences.english: The sergeant brought the guards to attention and saluted the inspection officer.
sentences.chinese: 中士令衛隊立正並向檢閱官敬禮。

sentences.english: After their addresses, the two leaders inspected the Guard of Honor.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，兩國領導人檢閱了儀仗隊。

sentences.english: After the inspection, the two leaders made some remarks respectively.
sentences.chinese: 在檢閱了儀仗隊後，兩國領導人先後致詞。

sentences.english: Put the soldiers at ease while waiting for inspection.
sentences.chinese: 等待檢閱時讓士兵們稍息。

sentences.english: Accompanied by Balkenende, Wen inspected the honor guards of the Dutch military.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶在巴爾克嫩德陪同下檢閱了荷蘭軍隊儀仗隊。

sentences.english: The battalion marched from the barracks to the parade ground.
sentences.chinese: 這個營的士兵列隊從營房齊步走向檢閱場。

sentences.english: The men were at attention as the inspecting officer passed through the ranks.
sentences.chinese: 當檢閱官從隊伍中走過時，士兵們都立正。

sentences.english: The soldiers lined up for their daily inspection by their officers.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們列隊接受軍官的日常檢閱。

sentences.english: One day God will review your answers to these life questions.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，神要檢閱你對這些生命問題的答案。

sentences.english: Check out this extensive reference, also at University of Oregon.
sentences.chinese: 檢閱這份也來自於奧勒岡大學的豐富資料。

definition: to patrol/to make a tour/to inspect/to scan with one's eyes
specific to a particular stage (of a project etc)/interim (policy etc)/occurring in stages/phased
guard home, defend the country (idiom); national defense
Premier Zhou Enlai 周恩來|周恩来 (1898-1976)
